fields.semantics: Model's epistemic certainty in regime classification. Computed as max(belief_distribution). Higher = more certain.
Policy-adjusted confidence after governance constraints (hysteresis, DEFCON, risk limits). May differ from belief_confidence if suppression occurred.
Copy of belief_confidence at time of policy decision. Enables divergence calculation without JOIN.
Confidence of the belief that was suppressed (not acted upon).
Confidence of the regime that was chosen instead (policy override).

metrics.name: suppression_confidence_loss
metrics.semantics: Delta showing confidence sacrificed due to policy override. Positive = belief was more confident than policy.

metrics.name: belief_policy_divergence
metrics.semantics: How much confidence was adjusted during policy formation

business_rules.action: Log to anomaly table, flag for human review
business_rules.rationale: Model is uncertain - decisions may be unreliable
Belief was overridden - track for learning

business_rules.action: Flag for CEO review in v_suppression_summary

confidence_bands.label: VERY_HIGH
confidence_bands.interpretation: Model is highly confident in regime classification
confidence_bands.action_guidance: Trust signal, full position sizing allowed

confidence_bands.label: HIGH
confidence_bands.interpretation: Model is confident but some uncertainty exists
confidence_bands.action_guidance: Trust signal, consider reduced sizing in volatile conditions

confidence_bands.label: MODERATE
confidence_bands.action_guidance: Use with caution, consider confirmation from other signals

confidence_bands.label: LOW
confidence_bands.interpretation: Model is uncertain - near coin-flip probability
confidence_bands.action_guidance: Do not act on signal alone, seek additional confirmation

confidence_bands.label: VERY_LOW
confidence_bands.action_guidance: Treat as UNKNOWN regime, defensive positioning
